name: The Seatbuster
description:
Ladies! Just imagine, going into the bathroom and the toilet seat is down every time!!! Think this may just be a dream? Well, the revolutionary Seatbuster is going to make it a reality for millions of women around the world!

Here's how it works: Simply install the Seatbuster on the underside of your toilet seat so it covers the flush handle. When the seat is left up, the Seatbuster blocks the flush handle with a reminder to put the seat down. He'll put the seat down EVERY TIME, GUARANTEED! Our research had shown that it only takes 66 days to create a habit. All you have to do is install this easy-to-use device, and in only 66 days, you will never have to worry about getting a cold, wet, surprise ever again!
